title: NA Speaker condoles death of Justice (R) Faqir Muhammad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 30 (APP):Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq has expressed profound grief over the demise of former Supreme Court Judge, Justice (Retired) Faqir Muhammad Khokhar.
He said that upon hearing the news of Justice (R) Faqir Muhammad Khokhar’s passing, he felt deep sorrow.
Reflecting on his longstanding association with the deceased, Ayaz Sadiq described him as a person of impeccable character and compassion.
He also said  that Justice (R) Faqir Muhammad Khokhar treated everyone with respect and dignity, and his integrity and his professional contributions to judicial work will be remembered.
Extending heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family, Ayaz Sadiq prayed to Allah Almighty to grant them the patience to bear this irreparable loss. He also prayed for the elevation of the deceased’s ranks in Jannah.
